Uses of Class
com.fasterxml.clustermate.api.KeyRange

  • Packages that use KeyRange 
    Package Description
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.api  
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.client  
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.cluster
    Package that contains client-side abstractions that deal with state of server, including rudimentary information about possible server clusters.
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.json
    Package that contains Jackson converters, primarily for reading/writing data as JSON, but also applicable to other formats Jackson supports.
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cluster  
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.sync

      KeyRange NodeState.totalRange() 
      KeyRange KeyRange.union(KeyRange other)
      Method for calculating combined range formed by this range and given range; ranges must overlap or be adjacent (if they are not, IllegalArgumentException will be thrown)
      static KeyRange KeyRange.union(KeyRange range1, KeyRange range2)
      Method for calculating combined range formed by two specified overlapping or adjacent ranges Ranges must overlap or be adjacent: if they don't, IllegalArgumentException will be thrown; that is, this method does not work for disjoint ranges.
      static KeyRange KeyRange.valueOf(KeySpace space, String ref) 
      KeyRange KeyRange.withLength(int newLength)
      Fluent factory method for creating a range with same start point, but possibly different length
